account.name: Name
account.createUniqueUsername: Create a unique username to make it easy for other members to find you and send chat requests or room invitations.
account.usernameRequirement: It must contains at least 1 letter and 1 number.

chat.messageFlagged: ‚ö†Ô∏è flagged as inappropriate by other users
chat.loadingFileVideo: Loading video. It will be available shortly.

chat.fileIsNotSupported: File type is currently not supported
chat.fileLimitAmountReached: Only 10 files can be shared at once
chat.cantDeleteFileBecauseRoomAvatar: Can't delete file because it's used as room avatar
chat.thisFileHasBeenDeleted: The file has been cleared. Click to reload
chat.inappropriateMessageTooltip: This message was flagged by multiple users
chat.unindexedRoomDescription: The room performance is not optimal at the moment. Please tag an Admin to come online to enhance performance.
chat.resetAdminSheetMessage: This will remove all other admins and make you the sole admin in this room, from your current device.
chat.holdToRecord: Hold to record, release to send
chat.maxPinsMessage: You can pin a maximum of $1 messages. To pin this one, you need to unpin an older message.

dm.acceptRequestFromDescription: If you accept, you and $1 will be able to chat and make calls in private.
dm.deleteRequestDescription: This chat will be removed from message requests.
dm.noId: You can't send a Direct Message to this member because they haven't set up their Keet Profile.
dm.inviteToChatDescription: You can send a message with this request. A chat room will be created. This chat room will remain in your main list and cannot be deleted or closed.
dm.no_id_description: To start a DM with other members, you must first set up your Keet Profile.
dm.chat_request_sent_description: You can send more messages after your request has been accepted.
dm.sendDmToRejectedRequest: You previously ignored a message request from this member. Would you like to accept it now?
dm.ignoreDmDescription: This member won't be notified, and they can't send more requests unless you send them a message request.

chat.messageLinkCopied: Message link copied to the clipboard. It's valid for 2 days

call.alertTitle: You will be leaving the call
call.alertDesc:
To join this new call, you must disconnect from the ongoing call.
Do you wish to leave the current call?
call.alertLeaveCall: Are you sure you want to leave the call?
call.phoneAccountDesc: Enable Keet in calling accounts, This is required for enhancing call experience in background.
call.participantsLimitInfoDisabled: Just a heads up! To keep things running smoothly, a maximum of 4 participants can enable video.
call.participantsLimitInfoLimited: Just a heads up! To keep things running smoothly, the video quality has been lowered and a maximum of 4 participants can enable video.
call.callNoActivityNotice: If there is no activity, the call will end in $0 minutes.

coming_soon.call: Room video calls coming soon to Keet mobile!

common.deeplinkNotSupported: This does not appear to be a Keet invite link.
common.wrongImageFormat: Image is damaged or format is not accepted
common.enablePermission: Please enable it from your system settings
common.newVersionDescription:
Explore an array of exciting new features, including the much-anticipated Calls !!!
To ensure you make the most of these enhancements, kindly be informed that App v2 is not compatible with previous mobile versions. Start exploring!
common.videoError: The file cannot be played at this time due to format incompatibility.
common.sendTo: Please select a room to send the media to

setup_name.title: Choose a username
setup_name.name: Name *
setup_name.disclaimer: You can change the display name at any time. Go to **Profile** > **Edit name**.

on_boarding.step1Hint: Your activity isn‚Äôt tracked, and no one‚Äôs collecting any data on you. It is fully peer-to-peer
on_boarding.step2Hint: No servers. No compromises. Your rooms are fully yours.
on_boarding.step3Hint: Keet is constantly evolving. Stay updated on all platforms to enjoy the latest features and best performance!

downloads.permissionError: You didn't grant permissions to Keet :(

lobby.title: My rooms
lobby.emptyBody:
Get started by creating a chat room or
joining an existing one. Simply press the
[+] icon above.

roomActions.onboardText: A room allows you to chat privately with friends and family, start video calls, transfer money and much more!

roomTypeAction.title: What type of room?
roomTypeAction.description: Select whether you want to create a room to chat or a room to broadcast messages to a larger community.

createAction.title: Group chat
createAction.description: A room where users can privately chat with family and friends.

channelAction.title: Broadcast feed
channelAction.description: A room for larger communities and organizations, in which you can create Live space, make announcements and more.

disclaimer.title: Room Admin
disclaimer.subtitle: Ensure the seamless operation and consistently optimize the performance of the room.
disclaimer.rule1: Be online as often as possible to keep the room alive and avoid latency.
disclaimer.moderatorAcknowledged: I understand what being an Admin of an official room means

roomActions.callPreference: Participants in the call won‚Äôt see if you dismissed the call. You can set your preference for notifications in room settings.

lobby.cancelPairingDesc: Are you sure you want to cancel joining the chat room?

cameraQrScan.noCameraAccessDesc: This function needs you to allow access to camera. You can enable camera permission from system settings
cameraQrScan.noQrFound: No QR code detected. Please ensure that the selected image contains a valid QR code.

room.callDisabledNotification: You can not start or join a call in this room

dialog.moderator1: Change the room name and room avatar
dialog.moderator3: Invite others to join room as a moderator
dialog.moderator4: Invite others to join room as a moderator and indexer
dialog.moderator5: Ban users from the room (coming soon)
dialog.peer2: Invite others to join as peer
dialog.admin2: Be online frequently to improve the room performance

room.adminInvitationAlert: You‚Äôre about to create an admin invite. Remember, a few active admins are better than many inactive ones. A stable majority of frequently online admins is key to a smooth chat room. Keep your admin invites limited for the best experience.
room.moderatorInvitationAlert: Moderator invites are single use only
room.adminInviteAreSingleUse: Admin invites are single use only
room.name: Room name
room.blockUserConfirmHint:
Are you sure? You won't be able to interact with this user while blocked and you won't see user's messages next time you access the room.
You can unblock this user from participant list tab.
room.reportContentConfirmHintPart1: For any content related to child endangerment or abuse, immediately contact the
room.reportContentConfirmHintPart2: . For any other illegal content, contact your local law enforcement agency. Note that Keet cannot see the content of any communications.
room.reportContentBlockUserHint: If you'd like to hide content from this member you can also block them.
room.tipLongPress: You can long press on any message to display more options.
room.roomCantBeFoundTitle: Ooops! Room could not be found
room.roomCantBeFoundNoOneOnlineText: It seems that there is currently no one online to let you in, please check with the person you are trying to connect with.
room.roomCantBeFoundBadNetworkText: It seems like you may be experiencing network issues, please check your connection and try again.
room.roomCantBeFoundDiscordText: For any questions or additional help feel free to join our **[Discord](https://discord.gg/holepunch)**.
room.invitationExpiredTitle: Ooops! Could not join the room
room.filesClearFailed: Could not remove files from Keet
room.leaveTitle: Are you sure you want to leave the room?
room.leaveMessage: All files from the room will be removed from device. You will need a new invite if you want to join again.
room.leaveAdminMessage: By leaving this room, you renounce your admin responsibilities. You will no longer receive messages or notifications from this room.
room.leavePeerMessage: This will remove all the files in this room from your device.
room.forceLeaveMessage: There are no admins left in this room. The room will become unusable for peers if you leave. Are you sure you want to continue?
room.forceLeaveCheckbox: I understand the consequences of leaving this room
room.oldRoomLeaveMessage: This looks to be an outdated room. Are you sure you want to continue with leave room?
room.oldRoomLeaveCheckbox: By checking this box, I understand.
room.clearFilesMessage: All files from the room will be removed from the device.
room.toConnectPasteLink: To connect, paste this link into Keet.io, the unstoppable P2P chat app:
room.waitingForSomeoneToLetYouIn: Waiting for someone to let you in. You will join the room automatically when there is someone online.

channelRoomTips.title: Welcome to $1
channelRoomTips.description: A few steps to help you get started

walkthroughTooltip.createOrJoin: Create or join your own secure room on Keet.
walkthroughTooltip.welcomeToKeet:
Welcome to Keet, where privacy matters! 
Customize your profile and appearance with no data stored.
walkthroughTooltip.customizeYourProfile: Customize your profile and appearance with no data stored.

chatLinkConfirmation.ifYouTrustThisLink: If you trust this link, select it to continue.

pairingNotification.asked: You have successfully requested to join the room.
pairingNotification.completed: You have successfully joined the room.
pairingNotification.cancelled: You have successfully cancelled the request to join.

adminDashboard.title: Admin dashboard
adminDashboard.selfUpgradeAdminNotification: You were upgraded to Admin in
adminDashboard.selfUpgradeModNotification: You were upgraded to Moderator in
adminDashboard.lastAdminDisclaimer: You are the only admin in the room. To revoke your role, you must assign another admin first.
adminDashboard.adminUpgradeDisclaimer: To upgrade a user to an Admin, please create an Admin room invitation link from room options.
adminDashboard.downToPeerDesc: This member's role will be downgraded to Peer, removing their current capabilities.
adminDashboard.downToModDesc: This member's role will be downgraded to Moderator, giving them Moderator capabilities.
adminDashboard.upToModDesc: This will update the member's role from peer to moderator.
adminDashboard.upToAdminDesc: This will update the user's role from Peer to Admin.
adminDashboard.removeMemberDescription: This member will be removed from the room and won‚Äôt be able to rejoin unless they receive a new invitation.
adminDashboard.mutedMemberDescription: The member will be able to send messages in the room and they won't be notified about this change.
adminDashboard.unmutedMemberDescription: The member won't be able to send messages in the room and they won't be notified about being muted.
adminDashboard.muteDisclaimer: The member won't be able to send messages in the room and they won't be notified about being muted.
adminDashboard.unmuteDisclaimer: This member will now be allowed to send messages in the room and will be visible to others.
adminDashboard.muteDisclaimer_1: They won‚Äôt be able to send messages in the chat.
adminDashboard.muteDisclaimer_2: They won‚Äôt be notified that you muted them.
adminDashboard.muteDisclaimer_3: You can unmute them at any time in Admins and moderators.

adminResponsibilities.title: What are the moderator capabilities?
adminResponsibilities.beOnline: Be frequently online to improve the room performance
adminResponsibilities.invite: Invite others to join room as a moderator and admin
adminResponsibilities.pin: Can pin up to 10 messages for everyone in the room

modResponsibilities.title: What are the moderator responsibilities?
modResponsibilities.name: Change the room name and room avatar
modResponsibilities.ban: Ban users from the room (coming soon)

networkStatus.okShort: You are online and on a friendly network
networkStatus.bad: Heads up! You're on a limited network, which may affect connections with other devices on limited networks

inviteSomeone.description: Chat directly with your friends. Send messages, files, high quality videos & photos with no limitations. Private & Encrypted. Always Peer-to-Peer. Never on a server.
inviteSomeone.scanQr:
Scan the QR code above 
to download

shareProfile.description: This QR code is private. If you share it with someone, they can scan it to start chatting.

getStarted.getStartedDesc: To start using your wallet, choose between our default server or your own custom server.

recoverOption.chooseOptionDesc: Select "Import" if you already have a crypto wallet.

recoveryPhrase.title: Set up recovery phrase
recoveryPhrase.text1: Keep your wallet safe by backing up your recovery seed. Save or write down the 24 secret words below and store them in a secure location.  These words are essential for recovering your funds if you ever lose access to your device.
recoveryPhrase.text2: It's crucial that you do not disclose these words to anyone else.
recoveryPhrase.verifyDescription: To ensure the security of your funds, verify that you have safely stored your 24-word secret recover phrase by selecting the 5th and 12th words from your recovery phrase.

delete.title: Delete wallet?
delete.info: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
delete.notice: You will need to close your pending transactions and transfer your funds to another wallet before deleting it.

import.title: Import wallet
import.inputDesc: You can import your existing wallet simply by entering the 24 word recovery phrase.
import.error: It looks like you have the wrong words. Remember, the order and spelling of the words matter.
import.loading: Recovering your wallet. This might take a while.

send.title: Send money
send.description: Send money to an existing Keet contact or an external wallet address.

network.verifyAndTryAgain: Verify your network settings and try again.

version.banner: Please update the app for a better experience.
version.roomUpgradeBanner: Some rooms might not work with your current version of Keet. Please update the app to access all your rooms.

feedback.title: Lets have your feedback
feedback.type: What kind of feedback is it?

syncDevice.title: Keet Profile
syncDevice.ensureTheSafety: Save or write down the 24 secret words below and store them in a secure location. These words are essential for recovering your account if you ever lose access to your device.
syncDevice.doNotShare: It's crucial that you do not share these words with anyone else.
syncDevice.toEnsureTheSecurity: To ensure the security of your account, verify that you have safely stored your 24-word secret recover phrase by selecting the 5th and 12th words from your recovery phrase.
syncDevice.errorWrongWords: It looks like you have selected the wrong words. Please double-check your selection and try again.
syncDevice.nowYouCanLogin: You can now add other devices to this profile.

modal.title: Confirm linking devices
modal.text1: Just a quick check to ensure it's really you making the request to link your devices.
modal.text2: Your security is important to us. Please click the confirmation link below to proceed and ensure your devices are linked.

setupModal.title: Welcome to Profile Setup
setupModal.text1: Secure your profile with a 24-word recover phrase.
setupModal.text2: Choose Quick setup to auto-generate and store it securely, or [Manual setup]() if you‚Äôd like to manage it yourself.
setupModal.acknowledged: I understand that Quick setup will generate and store my recovery phrase on my device.
setupModal.tos: By continuing you confirm you have read and agreed to our [Terms of Service]().

syncModal.title: Welcome to Device Link
syncModal.text1: To proceed, you can scan the **QR code** from your other device or use the **invite link** shown on your other device.
syncModal.text2: Please be aware that upon completion, the existing rooms on this device will be merged with the rooms on your other device.
syncModal.text3: If you prefer an alternative route, you can always go back and choose to set up a new set of words.
syncModal.checkbox: I acknowledge that if I proceed and haven't setup a recovery phrase on this device, all rooms and files will be merged.

syncDeviceOpts.title: Link devices
syncDeviceOpts.cameraScan: Open your camera to scan a QR code and link a device
syncDeviceOpts.inputDesc: Paste your account link, go to your device‚Äôs **Profile** > **My devices** > **Add device**.
syncDeviceOpts.inputError: Link appears to be invalid. Please double check and try again.
syncDeviceOpts.qrError: This invite link doesn‚Äôt seem to be working. Please check it and try again.
syncDeviceOpts.syncWaitDesc: Open the device you'd like to link with your account and tap on 'confirm link request' to proceed. Double-check that it's the correct device making the request.
syncDeviceOpts.errorDesc: Some kind of appropriate error description would be usefulll here

searching.checkIsCorrectDevice: Check this is the correct device before proceeding.

syncing.openDeviceToProceed: Open the device you'd like to link with and tap on **Confirm sync request** to proceed.
syncing.doubleCheck: Double-check that it's the correct device making the request.

notification.title: New Profile
notification.desc: Please restart the app now to complete the Profile creation process

accessGuide.title: How to access your recovery phrase:

quickSetup.loadingTitle: Sit tight! We‚Äôre setting up your Keet Profile
quickSetup.loadingNote: This might take a couple of minutes. Thanks for your patience.
quickSetup.loadingDesciption: Securing your recovery phrase on your device...

myDevices.invitationAlert: Caution: You're generating a secure invitation to sync another device with your identity. Treat this invite with the same confidentiality as your password.
myDevices.thisDeviceShares: Your recovery phrase is the same on all linked devices and will remain stored until you remove them.
myDevices.renameDeviceDescriptionOnboarding: This can be done later, in your account settings.

identityModal.title: Your Keet Profile
identityModal.desc: Choose how you‚Äôd like to set up your Keet Profile for this device:

setup.title: Create a new profile
setup.desc: Start fresh with a new profile for this device

sync.title: Link to existing profile
sync.desc: Connect this device to an existing profile

identityBackupConfirm.description: Proceeding without completing the setup means all your account data will be on this device and you'll be locked out if you ever lose it.

recoverAccount.enterToSync: Enter or paste the unique 24-words recovery phrase you have set up on another device.
recoverAccount.recoverError: It looks like you have the wrong words. Remember, the order and spelling of the words matter.

setupModal.title: Important notice
setupModal.text1: Recovering your account using the 24-word recovery phrase creates a new identity instance. Proceed only if you've lost access to your current identity on all devices.
setupModal.text2: If you want to add an identity to this device, please choose the **Link to existing identity** option.

recoverAccount.loading: Recovering your profile. This might take a while.

profileSetupInfo.title: Keet Profile update üöÄ
profileSetupInfo.description:
It‚Äôs time to take your Keet experience to the next level!¬†üéâ With this upgrade, you‚Äôll unlock:

‚ú® **Direct Messaging**: Send and receive private messages with ease.
‚ú® **Profile Recovery**: Securely restore your account and chats on any device.
‚ú® **Simple Setup**: Set up your profile in just 3 clicks‚Äîyour private seed phrase is safely stored on¬†your¬†device only.

No worries‚Äîthis upgrade won‚Äôt affect your current rooms or chats. Everything stays right where it belongs!
profileSetupInfo.hint: Ready to explore the best of peer-to-peer messaging?

notifications.notificationsDisabled: All notifications are currently silenced. Change your profile settings to reactivate them.

passcode.set4DigitDesc: Set up a 4-digit PIN, or skip and set it up later under profile
passcode.turnOffPasscodeDesc: Are you sure you want to turn off the passcode? You can always turn it back on under profile.
passcode.addALayerOfSecurity: Add a layer of security by setting up app auto-lock after a certain time of inactivity.
passcode.confirmTransfer: Confirm your transfer by entering your 4-digit passcode.

cleanDevice.cleanYourDeviceDesc: This will remove all the data from this device.
cleanDevice.dataClearedDesc: All data has been removed from this device.

errorFallback.title: Oops, something went wrong
errorFallback.subtitle: There is an error, please restart app to continue using Keet.

errorMessages.inviteExpired: Oops! The room invitation has expired. Please request a new invitation from the room members.
errorMessages.invalidInvitation: For security reasons, the account link cannot be used here. Please paste it under Profile > My Devices
errorMessages.genericPairingError: Hmm, something went wrong with your invitation link. Make sure it's correct and give it another go!

errorLog.reportDesc: Tell us a bit more to help us make your experience better.

callTooltip.title: Your calls are private
callTooltip.desc: End-to-end encryption keeps your personal calls between you and the people you choose. Not even Keet can listen to them.

privacyAndSecurity.noRecoveryPhraseWarning: You have not stored any recovery phrase on this device.
privacyAndSecurity.recoveryPhraseSettingsDesc: Your recovery phrase provides full access to your account.
privacyAndSecurity.setPasscodeDesc: Setup a passcode to keep your account secure.

recoveryPhraseSettings.desc: Your recovery phrase gives full access to your account. Write them down or store them somewhere safe.
recoveryPhraseSettings.warningText: Make sure you're in a secure location before viewing your recovery phrase:
recoveryPhraseSettings.warningTextList1: - Do not let anyone see your secret phrase
recoveryPhraseSettings.warningTextList2: - Never share your secret phrase with anyone
